summary.span: 发现类构造函数的属性，并提供对构造函数元数据的访问权限。

span.span: Discovers the attributes of a class constructor and provides access to constructor metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ConstructorInfo` 用于发现构造函数的属性以及调用构造函数。`ConstructorInfo` is used to discover the attributes of a constructor as well as to invoke a constructor. 对象的创建方法是：对由 对象的 或 方法返回的 `ConstructorInfo` 调用 。Objects are created by calling on a `ConstructorInfo` returned by either the or method of a object. > [!NOTE] > 继承自 多个成员，例如 ，它们可用于检查泛型方法。 inherits from several members, such as , that can be used to examine generic methods. .NET Framework 版本2.0 中的构造函数不能是泛型，因此这些成员返回 `false` 或 `null`。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 constructors cannot be generic, so these members return `false` or `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例将 `ConstructorInfo` 与 和 结合使用来查找与指定的搜索条件匹配的构造函数。The following example uses `ConstructorInfo` with and to find the constructors that match the specified search criteria. [!code-cpp[type_getconstructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetConstructor3/CPP/type_getconstructor3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[type_getconstructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetConstructor3/CS/type_getconstructor3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[type_getconstructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetConstructor3/VB/type_getconstructor3.vb#1)]

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 此类不能由部分信任的代码继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
This type is thread safe.

para.span: 从 继承时，必须重写以下成员重载： 。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the following member overload: .

param.name: parameters
param.span: 一个值的数组，其与此构造函数的参数的数量、顺序和类型（在默认绑定的约束下）相匹配。

span.span: An array of values that matches the number, order and type (under the constraints of the default binder) of the parameters for this constructor.

param.span: 如果此构造函数不采用参数，则使用具有零个元素或 的数组，如 Object[] parameters = new Object[0] 中所示。

span.span: If this constructor takes no parameters, then use either an array with zero elements or , as in Object[] parameters = new Object[0].

param.span: 此数组中未使用值显式初始化的任何对象都将包含该对象类型的默认值。

span.span: Any object in this array that is not explicitly initialized with a value will contain the default value for that object type.

param.span: 对于引用类型元素，此值为 。

span.span: For reference-type elements, this value is .

param.span: 对于值类型元素，此值为 0、0.0 或 ，具体取决于特定的元素类型。

span.span: For value-type elements, this value is 0, 0.0, or , depending on the specific element type.

summary.span: 调用由具有指定参数的实例反映的构造函数，为不常用的参数提供默认值。

span.span: Invokes the constructor reflected by the instance that has the specified parameters, providing default values for the parameters not commonly used.

returns.span: 与构造函数关联的类的实例。

span.span: An instance of the class associated with the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `parameters` 数组中元素的数量、类型和顺序应当与此实例反射的构造函数的参数的数量、类型和顺序相同。The number, type, and order of elements in the `parameters` array should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the constructor reflected by this instance. 在调用构造函数之前，`Invoke` 确保调用方具有访问权限，并验证参数是否有效。Before calling the constructor, `Invoke` ensures that the caller has access permission and verifies that the parameters are valid. 对于完全受信任的代码，将忽略访问限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 也就是说，只要代码完全受信任，就可以使用反射来访问和调用私有构造函数、方法、字段和属性。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. > [!NOTE] > 若要创建没有实例构造函数的值类型的实例，请使用 方法。To create an instance of a value type that has no instance constructors, use the method. 对于以下重载版本，此方法是使用默认值的便捷方法。This method is a convenience method for the following overloaded version, using default values. 不能重写此方法。This method cannot be overridden. > [!NOTE] > 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]开始，此方法可用于访问非公共成员（如果已向调用方授予了 标记 ，以及非公共成员的授予集限制为调用方的授予集或其子集）。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller's grant set, or a subset thereof. （请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。）(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `parameters` 数组中元素的数量、类型和顺序应当与此实例反射的构造函数的参数的数量、类型和顺序相同。The number, type, and order of elements in the `parameters` array should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the constructor reflected by this instance. 在调用构造函数之前，`Invoke` 确保调用方具有访问权限，并且参数的数目、顺序和类型都是正确的。Before calling the constructor, `Invoke` ensures that the caller has access permission and that the parameters are of the correct number, order and type. 对于完全受信任的代码，将忽略访问限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 也就是说，只要代码完全受信任，就可以使用反射来访问和调用私有构造函数、方法、字段和属性。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. > [!NOTE] > 若要创建没有实例构造函数的值类型的实例，请使用 方法。To create an instance of a value type that has no instance constructors, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]开始，此方法可用于访问非公共成员（如果已向调用方授予了 标记 ，以及非公共成员的授予集限制为调用方的授予集或其子集）。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller's grant set, or a subset thereof. （请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。）(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

summary.span: 获取 值，该值指示此成员是构造函数。

span.span: Gets a value indicating that this member is a constructor.

value.span: 值，指示此成员是构造函数。

span.span: A value indicating that this member is a constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将重写 。This property overrides . 因此，在检查一组 对象（例如，由 返回的数组）时， 属性仅在给定成员为构造函数时返回 。Therefore, when you examine a set of objects - for example, the array returned by - the property returns only when a given member is a constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性将 对象标识为构造函数。The following example uses the property to identify a object as a constructor. [!code-cpp[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于从非托管代码访问托管类，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 有关 `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.

summary.span: 检索对象提供的类型信息接口的数量（0 或 1）。

span.span: Retrieves the number of type information interfaces that an object provides (either 0 or 1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于从非托管代码访问托管类，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 有关 `IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`, see the MSDN Library.

exception.span: 不支持使用 COM IDispatch 接口的后期绑定访问。

span.span: Late-bound access using the COM IDispatch interface is not supported.

MemberSignature.Value: void _ConstructorInfo.Invoke (uint dispIdMember, ref Guid riid, uint lcid, short wFlags, IntPtr pDispParams, IntPtr pVarResult, IntPtr pExcepInfo, IntPtr puArgErr);

.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Runtime.InteropServices._ConstructorInfo.Invoke(unsigned int32 dispIdMember, [in]valuetype System.Guid& riid, unsigned int32 lcid, int16 wFlags, native int pDispParams, native int pVarResult, native int pExcepInfo, native int puArgErr) cil managed

Sub Invoke (dispIdMember As UInteger, ByRef riid As Guid, lcid As UInteger, wFlags As Short, pDispParams As IntPtr, pVarResult As IntPtr, pExcepInfo As IntPtr, puArgErr As IntPtr) Implements _ConstructorInfo.Invoke

virtual void System.Runtime.InteropServices._ConstructorInfo.Invoke(System::UInt32 dispIdMember, Guid % riid, System::UInt32 lcid, short wFlags, IntPtr pDispParams, IntPtr pVarResult, IntPtr pExcepInfo, IntPtr puArgErr) = System::Runtime::InteropServices::_ConstructorInfo::Invoke;

param.name: dispIdMember
param.span: 标识成员。

span.span: Identifies the member.

param.name: riid
param.span: 留待将来使用。

span.span: Reserved for future use.

param.span: 必须为 IID_NULL。

span.span: Must be IID_NULL.

param.name: lcid
param.span: 要在其中解释自变量的区域设置上下文。

span.span: The locale context in which to interpret arguments.

param.name: wFlags
param.span: 描述调用的上下文的标志。

span.span: Flags describing the context of the call.

param.name: pDispParams
param.span: 指向一个结构的指针，该结构包含一个参数数组、一个命名参数的 DISPID 参数数组和数组中元素数的计数。

span.span: Pointer to a structure containing an array of arguments, an array of argument DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts for the number of elements in the arrays.

param.name: pVarResult
param.span: 指向要存储结果的位置的指针。

span.span: Pointer to the location where the result is to be stored.

param.name: pExcepInfo
param.span: 指向一个包含异常信息的结构的指针。

span.span: Pointer to a structure that contains exception information.

param.name: puArgErr
param.span: 第一个出错自变量的索引。

span.span: The index of the first argument that has an error.

summary.span: 提供对某一对象公开的属性和方法的访问。

span.span: Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于从非托管代码访问托管类，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 有关 `IDispatch::Invoke`的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDispatch::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.

exception.span: 不支持使用 COM IDispatch 接口的后期绑定访问。

span.span: Late-bound access using the COM IDispatch interface is not supported.

summary.span: 表示存储于元数据中的类型构造函数方法的名称。

span.span: Represents the name of the type constructor method as it is stored in metadata.

summary.span: 该名称始终为“.cctor”。

span.span: This name is always ".cctor".

summary.span: 此属性是只读的。

span.span: This property is read-only.
